actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, Education and the Workforce, and Natural Resources, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: To prohibit the Department of Health and Human Services from using any Federal funds to conduct or support a video contest on the Internet or by means of other media.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: This bill prohibits the Department of Health and Human Services from using federal funds to conduct or support a video contest on the Internet or by other media.
